SportsEvents.title: 100m Sprint
SportsEvents.desc: Individual sprint race over 100 meters.

SportsEvents.title: 200m Sprint
SportsEvents.desc: Individual sprint race over 200 meters.

SportsEvents.title: 400m Sprint
SportsEvents.desc: Individual sprint race over 400 meters.

SportsEvents.title: 800m Race
SportsEvents.desc: Middle-distance race over 800 meters.

SportsEvents.title: 1500m Race
SportsEvents.desc: Long-distance race over 1500 meters.

SportsEvents.title: 4x100m Relay
SportsEvents.desc: Team relay race with 4 members each running 100 meters.

SportsEvents.title: 4x400m Relay
SportsEvents.desc: Team relay race with 4 members each running 400 meters.

SportsEvents.title: Long Jump
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes jump as far as possible from a takeoff board.

SportsEvents.title: High Jump
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes jump over a bar set at varying heights.

SportsEvents.title: Pole Vault
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes use a pole to vault over a bar.

SportsEvents.title: Shot Put
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes throw a heavy spherical object as far as possible.

SportsEvents.title: Discus Throw
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes throw a heavy disc as far as possible.

SportsEvents.title: Javelin Throw
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes throw a spear-like object as far as possible.

SportsEvents.title: Hammer Throw
SportsEvents.desc: Individual event where athletes throw a heavy weight attached to a wire.

SportsEvents.title: Cricket
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport with two teams taking turns to bat and bowl.

SportsEvents.title: Football
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport with two teams trying to score goals by getting a ball into the opposing team’s goal.

SportsEvents.title: Basketball
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport with two teams trying to score points by shooting a ball through the opponent's hoop.

SportsEvents.title: Volleyball
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport with two teams hitting a ball over a net, trying to make it land in the opponent's court.

SportsEvents.title: Volleyball
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport with two teams hitting a ball over a net, trying to make it land in the opponent's court.

SportsEvents.title: Soccer
SportsEvents.desc: A team sport played between two teams of eleven players each, aiming to score by getting a ball into the opposing team's goal.

SportsEvents.title: Cricket
SportsEvents.desc: A bat-and-ball game where two teams of eleven players alternate between batting to score runs and fielding to dismiss the batsmen.

SportsEvents.title: Baseball
SportsEvents.desc: A bat-and-ball game where two teams of nine players take turns batting and fielding to score runs by hitting the ball and running bases.

SportsEvents.title: Rugby
SportsEvents.desc: A team sport played with an oval-shaped ball, where teams attempt to score by carrying, passing, or kicking the ball to score tries.

SportsEvents.title: Hockey
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport with two teams using sticks to hit a ball or puck into the opponent’s goal.

SportsEvents.title: Table Tennis
SportsEvents.desc: Individual or team sport played on a table with small paddles and a lightweight ball.

SportsEvents.title: Badminton
SportsEvents.desc: Individual or team sport played with rackets and a shuttlecock over a net.

SportsEvents.title: Chess
SportsEvents.desc: Strategic board game played between two individuals.

SportsEvents.title: Carrom
SportsEvents.desc: Indoor board game where players flick wooden discs into corner pockets.

SportsEvents.title: Kabaddi
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport where players take turns trying to tag opponents while holding their breath.

SportsEvents.title: Kho-Kho
SportsEvents.desc: Team sport where players try to tag opponents while running around a field.

SportsEvents.title: Rock Climbing
SportsEvents.desc: Sport where participants climb natural rock formations or artificial rock walls.

SportsEvents.title: Trekking
SportsEvents.desc: Long-distance, adventurous walking over rough terrain.

SportsEvents.title: Rappelling
SportsEvents.desc: Descending a vertical drop with the aid of a rope.
